participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Dreamy and artistic, Emma often expresses her emotions through music. She is determined to pursue her passion despite facing challenges.
participant_1.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and practical, Jake enjoys outdoor activities and has a deep appreciation for nature. He is dedicated to his work and loves sharing experiences with his dog.
participant_2.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado. i have a black lab named trooper. i'm a mechanical engineer. my favorite activity is rock climbing.
